import "../box product/box.css" import { useState } from "react" import iphone1 from "../Home page/images/iphone.jpeg" const Carditem=({image_url ,brand,price, disc , model })=>{ const [cart, setcart] = useState([]); const addToCart = (Box) => { setcart([...cart, Box]); }; return(
